fa-badge/dot.description: Whether to display a red dot instead of count

fa-badge/offset.description: set offset of the badge dot, like [x, y]

fa-badge/showZero.description: Whether to show badge when count is zero

fa-badge/status.description: Set Badge as a status dot

fa-badge/text.description: If status is set, text sets the display text of the status dot

fa-badge/numberStyle.description: sets the display style of the status dot

fa-badge/title.description: Text to show when hovering over the badge
